original_text: Now the house of Israel called its name manna. It was like coriander seed, white, and the taste of it was like wafers made with honey.
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속이 그 이름을 만나라 하였으며 깟씨 같이 희고 맛은 꿀 섞은 과자 같았더라

sentences.original_text: Now the house of Israel called its name manna.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 족속이 그 이름을 만나라고 불렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: and the taste of it was like wafers made with honey.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 맛은 꿀로 만든 과자 같았습니다.
